main.title: Self-expression and Beauty
main.subTitle: Piercing artist
main.text: Explore new facets of your style with Darya

about.text: My name is Dasha, and I am delighted to welcome you to my world of piercing and self-expression. With a great passion for art and many years of experience in the beauty industry, I create unique and stylish piercings, helping my clients unveil new facets of their style. My mission is not just to adorn, but to help people express their individuality through amazing and creative piercings. With special attention to detail and safety, each piercing is created with love and care so that you can feel confident and stylish. Let me help you discover new possibilities for self-expression and give your look a unique character. Let's create something amazing together!

form.formHeader: Feel free to reach out to me for any questions or opportunities!
